name: Shield of the Oathbound
description: Forged in the fires of ancient vows, the shield deflects all harm for the loyal, or weighs heavy upon the arms of the faithless. (Self: DEF +1; Other: ATK -1 for 3 turns)

name: Banner of the Eternal King
description: The lost banner rallies allies to valor, or saps the courage of foes who behold it. (Self: HP +1; Other: effect: battle)

name: Sanctified Blade
description: Blessed steel sharpens the arm of kin, or rends the armor of the unworthy. (Self: tempBuff ATK +1 for 3 turns; Other: tempDebuff DEF -1 for 2 turns)

name: Oathkeeper’s Vigor
description: The vow fortifies the heart of brothers, or chills the marrow of their enemies. (Self: HP +1; Other: RES -1)

name: Seal of Judgement
description: The sacred seal bestows blessing upon the loyal, or calls the guilty to trial by steel. (Self: loot; Other: effect: battle)

name: Knight’s Respite
description: A brief rest renews the sworn, but denies respite to the foe. (Self: HP +1; Other: ATK -1)

name: Ironclad March
description: The steady march empowers allied lines, or breaks the formation of the enemy. (Self: tempBuff DEF +2 for 2 turns; Other: tempDebuff RES -1 for 3 turns)

name: Vow of the First King
description: Ancient words heal the blood of knights, or ignite strife among the enemy host. (Self: HP +1; Other: effect: battle)

name: Holy Relic
description: The relic grants fortune to the worthy, or curses the grasp of the unholy. (Self: loot; Other: RES -1)

name: Sword of Verdict
description: The sword strikes truest in loyal hands, or draws the enemy into open combat. (Self: tempBuff ATK +2 for 1 turn; Other: effect: battle)

name: Knight’s Benediction
description: Blessing of health for the loyal, hex of weakness for the enemy. (Self: HP +1; Other: tempDebuff ATK -1 for 2 turns)

name: Armor of the Just
description: Plate forged in holy oath shields the virtuous, or burdens the guilty. (Self: DEF +1; Other: RES -1)

name: March of Triumph
description: The victorious march invigorates allies, or lures foes into reckless battle. (Self: tempBuff DEF +1 for 3 turns; Other: effect: battle)

name: Crown’s Favor
description: Royal favor grants unexpected aid to kin, or leaves enemies grasping at empty coffers. (Self: loot; Other: loot)

name: Trial by Steel
description: Challenges the worthy to rise in glory, or forces the unworthy into a duel they cannot win. (Self: HP +1; Other: effect: battle)

name: Vigil of the Iron Watch
description: Unblinking sentinels grant resolve to allies, or expose every weakness in the foe's stance. (Self: DEF +1; Other: RES -1)

name: Knight’s Challenge
description: A formal duel steels the hearts of comrades, or drags the enemy into perilous combat. (Self: tempBuff ATK +1 for 2 turns; Other: effect: battle)

name: Chalice of Light
description: The chalice heals the loyal hand, or sears the grasp of the corrupt. (Self: HP +1; Other: ATK -1)

name: Herald’s Call
description: The clarion summons courage to the true, or heralds doom for their enemies. (Self: loot; Other: tempDebuff RES -1 for 3 turns)

name: Sword Oath
description: A binding oath grants strength to the wielder, or forces the enemy into battle. (Self: tempBuff ATK +2 for 1 turn; Other: effect: battle)

name: Bulwark of Faith
description: An unwavering wall shelters allies, or traps foes in a cornered fight. (Self: DEF +1; Other: effect: battle)

name: Knight’s Blessing
description: Sanctified words restore the faithful, or curse the strength of adversaries. (Self: HP +1; Other: tempDebuff ATK -1 for 2 turns)

name: Royal Decree
description: A decree brings bounty to allies, or seizes the spoils from foes. (Self: loot; Other: loot)

name: Helm of Glory
description: The helm inspires comrades, or blinds the ambition of enemies. (Self: tempBuff DEF +1 for 3 turns; Other: RES -1)

name: Valiant Charge
description: The charge emboldens the righteous, or scatters the cowardly. (Self: tempBuff ATK +1 for 3 turns; Other: tempDebuff DEF -1 for 2 turns)

name: Gilded Aegis
description: Gold-plated shield grants honor to allies, or weighs upon the arms of enemies. (Self: DEF +1; Other: ATK -1)

name: Trial of Valor
description: Passing the trial strengthens the worthy, or forces the wicked into combat. (Self: HP +1; Other: effect: battle)

name: Oath-Forged Greaves
description: The greaves hasten allied lines, or slow the march of enemies. (Self: tempBuff DEF +1 for 2 turns; Other: tempDebuff RES -1 for 3 turns)

name: Knight Commander’s Orders
description: Orders guide the loyal to victory, or mislead the foe into ruin. (Self: loot; Other: tempDebuff ATK -1 for 3 turns)

name: The Last Bastion
description: The final defense bolsters allied resolve, or draws invaders into a desperate battle. (Self: HP +1; Other: effect: battle)

name: Sanctum Guard
description: The sanctum’s wardens lend their strength to allies, or strip the defenses of intruders. (Self: DEF +1; Other: RES -1)

name: Blazing Standard
description: The burning flag emboldens loyal warriors, or provokes reckless assaults from foes. (Self: tempBuff ATK +1 for 2 turns; Other: effect: battle)

name: Holy Crusade
description: The crusade heals and inspires the faithful, or forces heretics into open war. (Self: HP +1; Other: effect: battle)

name: Blessed Armor
description: Armor blessed by the High Priestess strengthens allies, or saps the will of enemies. (Self: tempBuff DEF +1 for 3 turns; Other: tempDebuff ATK -1 for 2 turns)

name: Knightly Feast
description: A feast restores the strength of comrades, or leaves foes weakened from hunger. (Self: HP +1; Other: RES -1)

name: Ceremonial Charge
description: The ceremony boosts allied morale, or disrupts enemy formations. (Self: tempBuff ATK +2 for 1 turn; Other: tempDebuff DEF -1 for 3 turns)

name: Grail of Honor
description: Drinking from the Grail heals the righteous, or poisons the wicked. (Self: HP +1; Other: ATK -1)

name: Knight’s Ransom
description: Gold flows to allies in need, or is seized from the enemy’s coffers. (Self: loot; Other: loot)

name: Paragon’s Charge
description: The Paragon’s example fuels allied resolve, or drives foes into unwanted combat. (Self: tempBuff ATK +1 for 3 turns; Other: effect: battle)

name: Fortress Keep
description: The fortress walls shelter friends, or become a trap for enemies. (Self: DEF +1; Other: effect: battle)

name: Swordmaster’s Gift
description: The master’s teachings sharpen allied blades, or dull the edge of the enemy. (Self: tempBuff ATK +1 for 2 turns; Other: tempDebuff ATK -1 for 2 turns)

name: Page’s Aid
description: A loyal page brings supplies to the front, or cuts enemy supply lines. (Self: loot; Other: tempDebuff RES -1 for 3 turns)

name: Vow’s Protection
description: Oaths of protection bolster allies, or bind foes in combat. (Self: HP +1; Other: effect: battle)

name: Knight-Captain’s Shield
description: A captain’s shield lends fortitude, or saps the will of attackers. (Self: tempBuff DEF +1 for 3 turns; Other: ATK -1)

name: Hall of Heroes
description: Tales of the Hall heal the weary, or weigh on the spirits of enemies. (Self: HP +1; Other: RES -1)

name: Knight’s Gambit
description: A daring move grants boon to allies, or catches foes off guard in battle. (Self: loot; Other: effect: battle)

name: Armor of Legends
description: Forged for the champions of old, this armor shields allies in glory, or burdens foes with its weight of history. (Self: DEF +1; Other: ATK -1)

name: Judicator’s Wrath
description: The wrath of the Judicator drives the faithful to righteous combat, or forces the enemy into battle on the Order’s terms. (Self: tempBuff ATK +1 for 2 turns; Other: effect: battle)

name: Hall of Oaths
description: Sworn promises echo in the hearts of allies, or gnaw at the resolve of traitors. (Self: HP +1; Other: RES -1)

name: Cavalier’s Spoils
description: The spoils of victory reward the valiant, or strip the enemy of their treasures. (Self: loot; Other: loot)
